Title: Basics of Triangles & Quadrilaterals
Description: This module consists of an introduction on triangles and quadrilaterals, covering basic definitions, sides, and angles.

Title: Basics of Circle
Description: This module consists of the definition of a circle and explains its key parts, including radius, diameter, chord, arc, sector, segment, and circumference.

Title: Introduction to Fractions
Description: This module introduces foundational fraction concepts, focusing on understanding, representing, comparing simple fractions, and recognizing common misconceptions.

Title: Types of Fractions
Description: This module develops skills in distinguishing and converting between proper, improper, and mixed fractions, recognizing like and unlike fractions, and finding and simplifying equivalent fractions.

Title: Operations on Fractions
Description: This module builds proficiency in adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing fractions, including solving real-world problems using fraction operations.

Description: This module consists of how triangles are classified based on their sides and angles.
